title: if i got disconnected during maintenance do i still get banned?
body: i really dont think i should i got disconnected just now

replies.body: Yup, you want to be extra careful if you're playing during maintenance periods.  We'll try our best to give you a heads up through the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page, so be sure to bookmark it in case anything comes up!
